metaDescription: Web Developer based in Montreal, Quebec, Canada
presentation: Passionate about the various aspects of development, I have acquired a wide range of skills through my studies and professional experiences.
presentation2: I have worked on projects ranging from automating mobile management to participating in the development of an analysis tool used by several companies. With a degree in web development and fullstack development, my goal is to turn my passion into a successful career and contribute to innovative digital projects.
